name: Lazerkill
description:
R Trigger = Fire Matter Dislocator Beam (Pew Pew)
R Shoulder Button = Use Anti-Gravity Burst (Basically a super-jump)
L Trigger = Activate Subspace Detonator (Turns Player into Bomb)
L Shoulder Button = Replicate Matter (Build Block Below Player)

Bottom-Face Button = Jump
Left Joy-Stick = Left-Right
Start+Select = Generate New Platform (Clears Point Counter)
